77.name: Brawn over Brains
77.description: You destroyed the Dredge weapon and brought a fellow norn back on the path of destiny.
77.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Assault the Hill," "Sever the Head," or "Silent Warfare."

113.name: Rift Warden
113.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
113.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

141.name: God Walking Amongst Mortals
141.requirement: Earn the title "God Walking Amongst Mortals" in Guild Wars.

250.name: Ransacker
250.description: People want you on their team.

361.name: Halloween Huntin'
361.description: How does one stuff a candy corn elemental?
361.requirement: Kill  of the Mad King's minions.

399.name: Out of Cluck
399.description: Nothing like roast chicken after a successful siege.
399.requirement: While inside the Urban Battleground fractal, your team killed all the chickens in the city.

419.name: Help in Hoelbrak
419.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in Hoelbrak.

541.name: Braham: Help from the Legions
541.description: Braham, a young norn claiming to be Eir Stegalkin's son, visits Rytlock Brimstone in his Black Citadel office and requests troop support to defend his homestead.

622.name: Crabgrabber
622.description: Steal and deny the crab from other players in the Southsun Crab Toss.

658.name: Dragon Ball Boss
658.requirement: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

724.name: Drinks All Around!
724.requirement: Play Belcher's Bluff with a player of every race.

775.name: Champion of the Pale Tree
775.requirement: Represent the Grove in the Crown Pavilion.  Escort sylvari emissaries to hot-air balloons.

796.name: Light Snuffer
796.requirement: Complete the first tier of the Queen's Gauntlet.

845.name: Daily Molten Menace
845.requirement: Defeat 25 Molten Alliance foes during a portal invasion.

852.name: Daily Watchwork Wrecker
852.requirement: Defeat 25 of Scarlet's twisted watchwork minions.

857.name: Explorer's Second Super Adventure
857.description: Contemplate World 2's stunning horizons at your leisure.
857.requirement: Complete feats by playing through Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2 in Exploration Mode.

bits.text: Complete World 2, Zone 1 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 2, Zone 2 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 2, Zone 3 in Exploration Mode.
Zone 1—#9
Zone 1—#2
Zone 1—#4
Zone 1—#5
Zone 1—#7
Zone 1—#8
Zone 1—#3
Zone 1—#6
Zone 1—#1
Zone 2—#11
Zone 2—#2
Zone 2—#3
Zone 2—#4
Zone 2—#5
Zone 2—#6
Zone 2—#7
Zone 2—#8
Zone 2—#9
Zone 3—#9
Zone 3—#2
Zone 3—#3
Zone 3—#4
Zone 3—#5
Zone 3—#6
Zone 2—#10
Zone 2—#1
Zone 3—#7
Zone 3—#8
Zone 3—#10
Zone 3—#1

916.name: Cleaned Your Clockheart
916.description: Let's see if the Aetherblades can work in the dark.
916.requirement: Destroy the Aetherblade hideout power source.

1080.name: Toxic Hallucination Slayer
1080.requirement: Kill  hallucinations triggered by toxic pollen.

1231.name: Aftermath Hallucination Slayer II
1231.requirement: Kill  hallucinations triggered by toxic pollen.

1252.name: Toy Quality Control
1252.description: Don't they ever test this stuff?
1252.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria.

1311.name: Marionette Lightfoot
1311.requirement: Triumph in the first assault on the Twisted Marionette's power regulators without being downed or hit by its stomp attack.

1344.name: Live on the Edge
1344.requirement: Enter the Edge of the Mists from anywhere in Tyria.

1356.name: Boss Thumper XXVII
1356.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1381.name: Nice Ride
1381.requirement: Transform into a mecha siege devourer at the workshop.

1412.name: Morale Booster
1412.requirement: Encourage Lion's Arch citizens at this dark time.

1665.name: Timely Arrival
1665.description: Story Instance: Trouble at Fort Salma
1665.requirement: Don't let any members of the stranded Seraph squad die.

1668.name: Not So Buff Now
1668.requirement: Complete the final encounter while preventing the Ascalonian menders from casting buffs.

1733.name: Sclerite Weapon Collection
1733.description: <c=@flavor>Keep the spirit of the Southsun Cove vacation frame of mind going all year round!</c>
1733.requirement: Unlock all  Sclerite weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1775.name: Candy Corn Crusher
1775.requirement: Defeat the Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn in Mad King's Labyrinth.

1860.name: Daily Ranger Winner
1860.requirement: Win  PvP match as a ranger.

1955.name: Daily Dry Top Event Completer
1955.requirement: Complete events in Dry Top in the Maguuma Wastes.

2044.name: Adept Toymaker
2044.description: Getting into the spirit of the season.
2044.requirement: Show your seasonal spirit by completing these achievements.

2049.name: Grawnk Munch
2049.description: That poor Grawnk, what a shocking demise. His stomach couldn't handle its stone-bloated size!

2071.name: Arboreal Protector
2071.requirement: Defend the arboreal siege carrier during the assault on the Mordrem Vinewrath.

2077.name: Dragon's Breath
2077.requirement: Gain  Dragon Damage power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2090.name: Daily Engineer or Thief Winner
2090.requirement: Win  PvP match as an engineer or thief.

2111.name: Daily Warrior or Ranger Winner
2111.requirement: Win  PvP match as a warrior or ranger.

2192.name: Machined Shield
2192.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Shield.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2308.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 16
2308.requirement: Complete  scale 16 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2355.name: Bolt I: The Experimental Sword
2355.description: Tyria's finest sword wielders are pure artists, deftly weaving traditional attacks with inspirational lightning maneuvers to create a deadly dance of steel. Consider the art and artisanship of Tyria as you take the first steps in your crafting of the legendary precursor Zap.
2355.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Find Eir's notes on sculpting inside her home at Stonewright's Steading in Hoelbrak.
Find Malchor's ancient notes on sculpting the gods at the Cathedral of Zephyrs.
Speak to Tirzie in the Orlaf Escarpments in Queensdale about painting.
Speak to Proteus Formshaper in the Canton Factorium in the Black Citadel.
Speak to Synergetics Expert Pixx in Rata Sum about melding metal and energy.
Speak to Kandien in the Grove about sylvari artwork.
Find a refugee in Zintl Holy Grounds in Sparkfly Fen who can tell you about hylek artwork.
Find a quaggan who can tell you about quaggan sculpture at Orsippus in Frostgorge Sound.
Talk to Yhrinnage in the Burnt Hollow in Fireheart Rise about plant sculpting.
Talk to Dierdre in the Hidden Garden jumping puzzle upon its completion.
Artistic expression purchased from Explorer Loana in Cursed Shore after protecting her from the Risen King.
Looted from the chest after defeating the Legendary Archdiviner in the Cliffside Fractal.
A figurine carried by krait in the Aquatic Ruins Fractal.
Artistic expression purchased from Mokooki in Dredgehaunt Cliffs after helping the grawl stave off Svanir attacks.
Artistic expression purchased from Shengra in Snowden Drifts after impressing the Mennerheim steadholders.
Artistic expression purchased from Skaald Fearin in Wayfarer Foothills after disrupting the grawl worship.
Artistic expression purchased from Sizza in Timberline Falls after scattering the unusually aggressive grawl.
Artistic expression purchased from Corva Sharpclaw in Fireheart Rise after stopping the Flame Legion from summoning embers.
Artistic expression purchased from the Wupwup Chief in Fireheart Rise after helping the Wupwup tribe survive so close to Flame lands.
Artistic expression purchased from Scholar Nabbi in Straits of Devastation after helping to clear out the risen from the graveyard outside of Zaishen Antheneum.
A relic carried by Ascalonians in the Urban Battleground Fractal.

2421.name: Never Say Die
2421.requirement: Complete the trial of strength with no deaths.

2447.name: Astralaria II: The Apparatus
2447.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Mechanism has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to honing a blade.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to weighting a haft.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secrets of precision forging tools.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2542.name: Ascended Recycling
2542.requirement: Collect and consume  powerful items from salvaging ascended gear.

2568.name: Forgotten City Arches
2568.description: Use your glider to experience the beauty of Tarir.
2568.requirement: Glide through / arches below the waterfall on the eastern side of Tarir.

bits.text: Glide below the highest set of arches.
Glide below the medium set of arches.
Glide below the lowest set of arches.

2664.name: Backdraft Dodger
2664.requirement: Avoid getting hit by Firestorm, and then defeat Sabetha.

2670.name: League Ranger—Elite
2670.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2670.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a ranger.

2713.name: League Warrior—Elite
2713.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2713.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a warrior.

2729.name: League Rank Earner—Elite
2729.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.
2729.requirement: Obtain 100,000 rank points from playing ranked matches.

2832.name: Scattered Memories
2832.requirement: Find scattered journal pages to learn more about the brigands.

bits.text: Perched on a cave mushroom.
Near where the ruined path begins.
Just beyond the ruined threshold.
Among violet forget-me-nots.
At the tenth column.
At the crumbling well.
On boxes stacked.

2841.name: Mineral Resource Extraction 103
2841.requirement: Dig up three bauble chests in World 1, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2847.name: Interior Design 202
2847.requirement: Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 2, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

2895.name: Daily Tier 3 Thaumanova Reactor
2895.requirement: Complete Thaumanova Reactor at fractal scale 51 or higher.

2937.name: Daily Heart of Maguuma Lumberer
2937.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
2937.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following Heart of Maguuma maps: Verdant Brink, Auric Basin, Tangled Depths, and Dragon's Stand.

2940.name: Daily Tier 1 Uncategorized
2940.requirement: Complete Uncategorized at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2944.name: Daily Tier 3 Molten Furnace
2944.requirement: Complete Molten Furnace at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3068.name: Daily Bloodstone Fen Magic Gatherer
3068.requirement: Gather Unbound Magic from the sky in Bloodstone Fen.

3142.name: No Bombs Allowed
3142.requirement: Stop the destroyer bombs from exploding.

3169.name: A Royal Tradition
3169.requirement: Complete a round of Mad King Says.

3205.name: Broken Nightmare
3205.requirement: Complete the Nightmare fractal on the Master tier.

3220.name: Daily Bitterfrost Frontier Torch in the Ice
3220.requirement: Participate in lighting or defending a brazier.

3232.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 51
3232.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3314.name: Gems of the Beach City
3314.description: These would look great with some rose quartz.
3314.requirement: Bring pearls to the merchant in the Lakeside Bazaar.

3418.name: Draconis Mons Insight: Savage Rise
3418.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Draconis Mons.

3464.name: Daily Tier 3 Shattered Observatory
3464.requirement: Complete Shattered Observatory at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3480.name: King Crab
3480.requirement: Kill the king crab in the cave.

3490.name: Siren's Landing Insight: Buoyant Bough
3490.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3529.name: Ember Bay Master
3529.requirement: Collect all  items to prove your mastery over Ember Bay.
3529.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Gathered from petrified stumps.
Obtained after defeating the pyroclastic jade construct.
Obtained from the Chalice of Tears jumping puzzle.
Win the favor of the circus in Ember Bay.
Assist the asuran researchers in Ember Bay.
Help the skritt encampment in Ember Bay.
Assist Scientist Vratt in Ember Bay.
Investigate the mursaat fortress in Ember Bay.
Hidden in skritt stashes.
Assist in Skrilla's treasure hunt.
Obtained after defeating Vermignus.
Dropped by Pirate Captain Huuhes.
Obtained after defeating the sloth queen.
Obtained after defeating the molten dominator.

3586.name: Hammer and Tongs
3586.requirement: Survive your encounter with the Herald of Balthazar without succumbing to her Herald's Doom attack.

3714.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Glint's Legacy
3714.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3715.name: Disrespect Your Elders
3715.requirement: Successfully defeat the four grand elder djinn within the Hanging Gardens.

3738.name: Desolation Griffon Expert: Silver
3738.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3767.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Vulture Drifts Summit
3767.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3775.name: Yoonam the Intrepid
3775.requirement: Defeat the fire djinn Yoonam the Intrepid.

3780.name: Beastcatcher
3780.requirement: Catch up to the Warbeast in under 15 minutes.

3798.name: Exaltation of the Guardians
3798.description: <c=@Flavor>Statues of fabled guardian beasts would be created by talented sculptors, to protect the kingdom in a monarch's absence.</c>

bits.text: Join the explorers in Desert Highlands on their grand search for Superior Buried Treasure.
Use casino coins to purchase goods from the casino blitz cashier.
Defeat the doppelganger hunting people near Augury Rock.
Sabotage the Maws of Torment and destroy the Legendary Forged Demolisher.
Clear the Branded Forgotten zealots from the Grand Court of Sebelkeh.

3892.name: Desert Highlands Griffon Expert: Silver
3892.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4004.name: Souled Out
4004.description: That vessel acts only on anger and instinct.

4010.name: The Ferrywoman
4010.description: For life inevitably yields the stage to death, as the day to the night, as the river to the sea.
4010.requirement: Complete the River of Souls event.

4142.name: The Queen and I
4142.requirement: Slay the champion beetle queen near Driftwood Jetty.

4146.name: Tracking the Scientist
4146.requirement: Infiltrate a hidden Inquest facility and learn the location of Taimi's Inquest scientist.

4170.name: Master Diver: Mount Maelstrom
4170.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4170.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Mount Maelstrom.

4345.name: A Good Defense
4345.requirement: Unlock  Elegy skins by crafting and completing collections.

4417.name: Memorabilia
4417.description: Awakening can be detrimental to the subject's memory.
4417.requirement: Find the pieces of Sonu's past scattered throughout Jahai Bluffs.

bits.text: Spoke to Sonu in Sun's Refuge and accepted his request.
North of the Tree, one still floats; your favorite toy as a child, those red toy boats.
In a house in Venta, an old frame lies; its story appears to whomever cries.
Right is left, but next time it's wrong; in the courtyard you will remember its song.
Along the River of Rilohn sits a large orange tree; with a view of the fortress, true love's flowers be.
In a graveyard from the right, pay your respects to whom they are due; one, three, then seven hold the clue.
You became a military man, though Awakened wear no suit. North of Wurmhaven, find your sword and salute.
Your favorite fruit, let that set in; a farmland's tree holds the key, to those who threaten.

4419.name: Fishy Business
4419.description: "The noblest of all our fish! Fries up a treat."—Lofa
4419.requirement: Find a rare Elonian Red Trout for Lofa.

4426.name: Good, Better, Nest
4426.description: "I find that old friends will come through in a pinch."—Taimi
4426.requirement: Collect at least 5 gifts for the nest Taimi is building.

bits.text: Speak to Taimi about Aurene's nest.
Retrieve a gift from the Free Awakened recruiter at Vabbi's Necropolis.
Retrieve a gift from Warmaster Steelburn at the Pact Vanguard camp.
Retrieve a gift from Sayida the Sly in Istan.
Retrieve a gift from Zalambur in his office at the Grand Sahil.
Retrieve a gift from Imann in Amnoon's council chambers.
Retrieve a gift from Mal at Atholma Farms.
Retrieve a gift from Azi at Yatendi Village.

4453.name: Mad Maleficence
4453.requirement: Track down trophies of the eternal feud between Mad King Thorn and Palawa Joko during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

bits.text: "Infiltrating Joko's palace, I stole off with his prized crown! (It's definitely not from a street vendor in Amnoon.)"
"I took this spoil of war from a mighty Awakened champion."
"Brazenly looting a Treasure Hunting Kit from Joko's minions, I dug up these supplies in Elona."
"A mad spirit arriving in the Labyrinth brought this prize on its journey."
"At the edges of the Mad King's Labyrinth, I unearthed this token from Joko's last defeat."
"While inspecting the fortifications of the Labyrinth, I found this left behind."
"After I beat Joko's record lap time on the King's Raceway, he left this in shame."
"I found this while patrolling the King's Raceway for spies."
"On a jailbreak from the Fortress of Gandara, I took a moment to loot this."
"I stole this from a tower in Joko's Gardens of Seborhin using a hidden portal."
"From atop a crumbling statue of the lich in Vabbi, I took this secret tome."
"In the Elon Riverlands, I ironically stole this from a monument to Joko's triumphs."
"Using a hidden key, I infiltrated Joko's Forbidden Vault in the Desolation and returned with this trophy."

4484.name: Daily Racer: Jormag's Fang
4484.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Snowden Drifts. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4590.name: No One Was Using It Anyway
4590.requirement: Use the Light of Deldrimor to locate hidden dwarven treasure.

4623.name: Chasing Tales: Harkon Hakson the Maelstrom
4623.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood axe and perform tasks to re-create Harkon Hakson's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Harkon Hakson the Maelstrom.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Hakson: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Hakson: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Hakson: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Harkon Hakson at a heroic font.

4633.name: Lap Cat
4633.requirement: Claim Knut Whitebear's seat as your own.

4654.name: Annual Nostalgia
4654.requirement: Complete the annual Super Adventure Box Nostalgia achievement. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4663.name: Friends in High Places
4663.requirement: Speak with Sayida or Taimi on the airship.

4704.name: Skyscale of Water
4704.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with water.

bits.text: Speak with Grand Elder Water Djinn Khiafe or Grandmaster Elder Djinn Emine at Zagonur Cliffs in the Domain of Vabbi. Defeat nearby foes to draw the djinn out.
Swim to the bottom of Ntouka Pond in the Domain of Kourna.
Swim to the bottom of Flooded Castavall in Bloodtide Coast.
Swim in the water chamber in Derelict Delve in Desert Highlands.

4788.name: Conserve the Land
4788.requirement: Defeat Cardinal Adina without detonating any stalagmites.

4843.name: Arena Gladiator
4843.requirement: Defeat a champion boss in the Dragon Bash Arena.

4860.name: (Annual) Flame Legion Finisher
4860.requirement: Kill  Flame Legionnaire in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4883.name: (Annual) Gauntlet Contender
4883.requirement: Defeat  Queen's Gauntlet boss in the Crown Pavilion during the Festival of the Four Winds. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4895.name: Bonus Event: Daily Champion Rush—Maguuma Jungle
4895.requirement: Defeat a champion-rank enemy in Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, or Mount Maelstrom.

4900.name: Ash Training Course: Silver
4900.requirement: Get silver in the Ash training course.

4903.name: Ooze Master
4903.requirement: Defeat the Ooze Pit's grand champion.

4941.name: Pass the Torch
4941.requirement: Pass 100 torches in the Flame Legion effigy event.

4955.name: Crater Circuit: Gold Challenge
4955.requirement: Finish the Crater Circuit within the gold challenge time limit.

4973.name: Grothmar Skyscale Challenge: Gold
4973.requirement: Prove your mastery over the skyscale in Grothmar Valley.

5046.name: Lighting the Forest
5046.requirement: Complete the light puzzle in the Aberrant Forest.

5068.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Bell Choir
5068.requirement: Take part in the Wintersday Bell Choir.

5090.name: Bjora Marches Insight: The Lost Kodan Ship
5090.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in Bjora Marches.

5105.name: Trials of Koda Mastery
5105.requirement: Earn gold participation in 20 Trial of Koda events in Bjora Marches.

5175.name: Queensdale Novice Explorer
5175.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Queensdale.

bits.text: Help Diah tend her farm.
Help Fisher Travis maintain the river.
Help Foreman Flannum improve dam safety.
Assist Farmer Eda with her orchard.
Help Cassie around the moa ranch.
Assist the Seraph at Shaemoor Garrison.
Ojon's Lumbermill Waypoint
Fields Waypoint
Orchard Waypoint
Garrison Waypoint
Western Divinity Dam Vista
Pumping Station Vista
Shaemoor Garrison Vista
Bandithaunt Caverns Vista
Point of Interest: Trainer's Terrace
Point of Interest: Jeb's Wheatfield
Point of Interest: Eda's Orchard
Point of Interest: Mepi's Moa Ranch
Point of Interest: Dalin's Pumping Station

5227.name: Engineer's Apprentice
5227.requirement: Retrieve lost supply drops for Ranoah Grindsteel.

5281.name: League Conqueror—3v3 Season One
5281.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 3v3 Season One.

5295.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Salvager
5295.requirement: Earn  charr salvage through gathering or by participating in events in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5311.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Overlook
5311.requirement: Destroy  structures at Petraj Overlook in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5348.name: Shards of Jormag
5348.description: Long ago, Primordus struck Jormag in battle and littered the Drizzlewood Coast in shards.
5348.requirement: Collect all Shards of Jormag in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

bits.text: Shard of Jormag #1
Shard of Jormag #2
Shard of Jormag #3
Shard of Jormag #4
Shard of Jormag #5
Shard of Jormag #6
Shard of Jormag #7

Shard of Jormag #9
Shard of Jormag #10

Shard of Jormag #12
Shard of Jormag #13
Shard of Jormag #14
Shard of Jormag #15
Shard of Jormag #16
Shard of Jormag #17
Shard of Jormag #18
Shard of Jormag #19
Shard of Jormag #20

5385.name: Ebon Vanguard Supporter
5385.requirement: Purchase  Ebon Vanguard supply boxes at the Eye of the North.

5412.name: Special Mission: No Charr Left Behind
5412.requirement: Rescue  prisoners from Dominion captivity in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5450.name: Energy Dispersal
5450.requirement: On the Master tier, disperse all thunderclouds during the final boss fight within 10 seconds, and then complete the encounter.

5469.name: League Participator—3v3 Season Two
5469.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Two.

5505.name: Primordus Rising
5505.requirement: Complete the story chapter Primordus Rising.

5517.name: Champions Insight: Metrica Province
5517.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Metrica Province Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5542.name: Daily Ebon Vanguard Donations
5542.requirement: Donate needed materials to the Ebon Vanguard.

5570.name: Crimson Dragon Slayer Weapon Collector
5570.requirement: Unlock  Crimson Dragon Slayer weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5591.name: Azure Dragon Slayer Weapon Collector
5591.requirement: Unlock  Azure Dragon Slayer weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5670.name: Skritt Global Ranks
5670.requirement: Speak with the skritt field leader in the Eye of the North once the global support goals are met.

5698.name: Tide Turner: Brisban Wildlands
5698.requirement: During the Dragon Response Mission, aid each recruited faction at least once while a challenge is active.

bits.text: Crystal Bloom
Exalted
Tengu
Skritt

5728.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Seven
5728.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Seven.

5756.name: Return to Lake Doric
5756.requirement: Complete  Return to The Head of the Snake achievements.

5779.name: Return to Bitterfrost Frontier
5779.requirement: Complete  Return to A Crack in the Ice achievements.

5823.name: Return to Research
5823.requirement: After completing Icebrood Saga Episode 5, visit Taimi and Gorrik at the Eye of the North to see how their dragon research is progressing.

5931.name: Crop Harvester: Grothmar Valley
5931.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Grothmar Valley.

5942.name: (Bonus) Strike Back: Raven Sanctum
5942.requirement: Defeat a legendary creature in the Raven Sanctum.

5972.name: Adventurous Spirit: Flight of the Eagle Spirit
5972.requirement: Complete the Flight of the Eagle Spirit adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5988.name: Bounty Hunter: Jahai Bluffs
5988.requirement: Complete bounties within the Jahai Bluffs.

6019.name: Local Response: Domain of Istan
6019.requirement: Complete  events in the Domain of Istan.

6095.name: Seitung Province Insight: Monastery Temple
6095.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6174.name: Guilt by Association
6174.requirement: Find out where the Crystal Bloom went off to.

6359.name: Lucky Guess
6359.requirement: Pick the winning moa racer in Club Canach.

6427.name: Daily Desert Fisher
6427.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6427.requirement: Gather raw materials by catching fish in the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, the Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

6435.name: Stayed 'til the End
6435.description: A heartfelt thank you from the entire End of Dragons development team!
6435.requirement: Watch the entire end credits roll.

6479.name: Seitung Province Insight: Valor Shrine
6479.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6484.name: Avid Ascalonian Fisher
6484.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6484.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Ascalon.

6562.name: Aurene's Facet of Shadows
6562.requirement: Aid Leivas in discovering a new form for your Aurene-based legendary weapon.

bits.text: Speak with Leivas to purchase enough Elder Dragon scale splinters to form a scale fragment.
Purify the scale fragment by successfully capturing or defending the Cathedral of Zephyrs in Malchor's Leap.
Acquire a completed memory of Zhaitan by collecting enough memory fragments of Elder Dragons.
Defeat Tequatl the Sunless while wielding an Aurene-based legendary weapon.
Purify the lingering Risen aether at one of Aurene's focusing crystals located at the Buried Archives.
Return to Leivas to purchase an uncharged fragment.
Defeat the Risen High Wizard at the Promenade of the Gods or hold the Gates of Arah while wielding an Aurene-based legendary weapon.

6612.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Two
6612.requirement: Complete 20 Adventure Guide: Volume Two achievements.
6612.locked_text: This achievement is locked until Adventure Guide: Volume One is complete.

6623.name: Earning Crafting Levels III
6623.requirement:
Earn 75 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6631.name: Leveling Up II
6631.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 30.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6659.name: Completing Renown Hearts I
6659.requirement:
Complete  renown heart.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6665.name: Defeating Elder Dragon Minions
6665.requirement: Defeat  Branded, Destroyer, Icebrood, or Mordrem enemy.

6711.name: Birthday—Year 11
6711.description: You have a character that is more than 11 years old.

6735.name: Decade of the Dragons
6735.requirement: Complete achievements from the Decade of the Dragons category.

6779.name: Seeking Scarlet: Thaumanova Reactor
6779.requirement: Complete the Thaumanova Reactor fractal after completing the episode "The Tower of Nightmares."

6877.name: The Deadliest Thing on Two Legs

bits.text: Ambush 1
Ambush 2
Ambush 3
Ambush 4
Ambush 5
Ambush 6

6889.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Seven
6889.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Seven.

6922.name: Seitung Province Siege Turtle Ace: Silver
6922.requirement: Complete the Seitung Province Siege Turtle adventure with a silver rating or better.

6976.name: Stormforged Weapon Collector
6976.requirement: Unlock all  Stormforged weapon skins by crafting or purchasing them from the trading post and binding them to you. Recipes can be purchased from Faction Provisioners in Amnytas after unlocking Skyforged weapon skins.

7088.name: Crystal Oasis Incursions
7088.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Crystal Oasis.

7188.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Beacon of Ages
7188.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7218.name: Skywatch Archipelago: Unlocking the Wizard's Tower
7218.description: It's not breaking and entering if you have a key.
7218.requirement: Forge a key to the Wizard's Tower.

7235.name: Mount Maelstrom Rift Hunting
7235.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Mount Maelstrom.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7677.name: Jump Start: Gift from the Mists
7677.requirement: After completing the request, speak with the Mist Stranger and receive a Dreambound weapon.

7713.name: Malchor's Leap Incursions
7713.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Malchor's Leap.

7724.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Southern Extractor
7724.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7749.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Forty
7749.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty.

7773.name: Misplaced Anger
7773.requirement: Defeat Queen Labris without getting hit by her Unquenchable Rage attack.

7807.name: Follow the Magic II
7807.description: A magic collector's job is never done.
7807.requirement:
Collect magic from the extractors in the Defiled Cradle.
Gain more progress if Follow the Magic is completed.

7900.name: Treasure Hunter: Dry Top (Weekly)
7900.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in Dry Top.

8038.name: Squad Interceptor
8038.requirement: Intercept recon and patrol squads and defeat their lieutenants around Amnytas and Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Inner Nayos Patrol Squad
Inner Nayos Loyalist Lieutenant
Bastion of the Obscure Recon Squad
Bastion of the Obscure Reconnaissance Lieutenant
Bastion of Strength Recon Squad
Bastion of Strength Reconnaissance Lieutenant

8122.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Frostgorge Sound
8122.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8122.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Frostgorge Sound.

8138.name: Reliving the Seasons 3
8138.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from Living World Season 3.

bits.text: Episode 1: Eir's Memorial in Hoelbrak
Episode 1: Research in Rata Novus
Episode 1: A Shadow's Deeds
Episode 1: Confessor's Stronghold
Episode 2: Taimi's Game
Episode 2: Dragon Vigil
Episode 3: Precocious Aurene
Episode 3: The Bitter Cold
Episode 3: Frozen Out
Episode 4: A Meeting of Ministers
Episode 4: Confessor's End
Episode 5: Taimi's Pet Project
Episode 5: Heart of the Volcano
Episode 6: White Mantle Hideout
Episode 6: Shining Blade Headquarters
Episode 6: The Last Chance

8155.name: Janthir Syntri Adventure: Save Woodland Creatures
8155.requirement: Locate the Save Woodland Creatures adventure in Janthir Syntri.

8191.name: Janthiri Treasure Hunter
8191.requirement: Sniff out and open  kodan caches throughout Janthir.

8205.name: A History Most Violent: Part 2
8205.description: A dark soul seeking darker secrets.
8205.requirement: Track down the records of Caudecus's research into Gavril.

bits.text: Speak to Priory Archivist Hellie at Forager's Hunt again.
Caudecus's journey started in the southeastern marches.
Caudecus stopped at the ruins of Gavril in the Slithering Outskirts.
Next, Caudecus moved along the edge of the Festering Basin.
Caudecus stopped near the stairs in the Festering Basin.
North of the Moldering Greenwood, Caudecus stopped for a drink.
Caudecus set off on his own, traveling north in the Sulfurous Springs.
Some of Caudecus's followers trailed him deep into the Sulfurous Springs but could not find him.
Speak to Hellie one last time at Forager's Hunt on Janthir Syntri.

8234.name: Janthir Syntri Adventure: River Mapping
8234.requirement: Locate the River Mapping adventure in Janthir Syntri.

8250.name: Warclaw Run Adventure: Silver
8250.requirement: Earn a silver time in the Warclaw Run adventure.

8273.name: Janthir Syntri Mastery
8273.description: Bearkin necessities are why they can forget their worries and strife.
8273.requirement: Complete  map achievements throughout Janthir Syntri.

8332.name: All the Queen's Men
8332.description: Even in life, Alessia's smile had the power to bring ruin to her enemies...

8496.name: Siege Golem Expertise
8496.requirement: Damage walls or gates with a siege golem 100 times.

8522.name: Revenge of Drakkar (Weekly)
8522.requirement: Prevent Drakkar from becoming more powerful by aiding Jhavi in her attack.

8541.name: Imperial Everbloom Weapon Collection
8541.requirement: Unlock all  Imperial Everbloom weapon skins in your wardrobe.

8592.name: Into the Corridor
8592.requirement: Escort Priory Scholar Ciana into the Bloodstone Corridor.
